title: python process cannot normally exit after calling methods of torch.cuda
body_html:
After executing the following lines and sending EOF, the shell won't normally exit and becomes unresponsive. No errors or warnings, nothing. Scripts with these two lines won't exit either, seems the process is blocked somehow. Ctrl+c does not work and I can only terminate them by kill -9.

>>> import torch
>>> torch.cuda.is_available()
True

My training script without calling the methods of torch.cuda can execute and exit normally.

System information:

  • OS: Linux
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.0.post4
  • Python version: 2.7.12
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0.61/6.0.20
  • GPU models and configuration: TITAN X (Pascal)
body_text:

body:
After executing the following lines and sending EOF, the shell won't normally exit and becomes unresponsive. No errors or warnings, nothing. Scripts with these two lines won't exit either, seems the process is blocked somehow. Ctrl+c does not work and I can only terminate them by kill -9.
```
>>> import torch
>>> torch.cuda.is_available()
True
```
My training script without calling the methods of torch.cuda can execute and exit normally.

System information:
- OS: Linux
- PyTorch version: 0.3.0.post4
- Python version: 2.7.12
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0.61/6.0.20
- GPU models and configuration: TITAN X (Pascal)
